entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY ENDED, Kingston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:15 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 01:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -10.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -11.8°C
Wind: NNW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle after midnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 01:27 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 01:27 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 01:27 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
